title: Methodology could lead to more sustainable manufacturing systems (Oregon State University)
text: ( Source : Oregon State University ) CORVALLIS, Ore. - Engineers at Oregon State University have developed a new 'sustainable development methodology' to help address a social and regulatory demand for manufacturing processes that more
